DOC.brief_summary: The aim project investigate , whether physical training , target neck shoulder muscle , reduce prevent neck pain among military helicopter pilot crewmembers .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Treatment Neck Pain Among Helicopter Pilots Crew Members
DOC.detailed_description: Military helicopter pilot crewmembers often burden work-related neck shoulder pain . Neck pain health challenge , reduce functional level , concentration operational safety . Physical exercise show good efficacy reduce neck/shoulder pain occupational group previous study . The Royal Danish Air Force University Southern Denmark , wish examine whether specific physical exercise prevent reduce neck/shoulder pain within occupational group . Participants project randomly select either physical exercise group reference group . - The physical exercise group follow train program target neck shoulder muscle train 1 hour per week ( 3 x 20 min ) 26 week . - The reference group continue normal routine , include workout routine . They later offer train program Physical Exercise group provide train positive effect .
DOC.criteria: Employed within Royal Danish Air Force Helicopter pilot Crewmember ( Flight engineer , Rescue swimmer Mission System Operator ) Flown within past 6 month Grounded time inclusion Participated training intervention within past 12 month
